title: How to Do the Figure Four Leg Lock

steps.title: Get your opponent on the floor.
steps.content: Get your opponent on the floor. You can achieve this by pushing them down on the ring or hitting with any other move that makes your opponent fall down. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Take their left leg and place your left leg on the right side of their leg then spin 360' so that you are facing your opponent.
steps.content: Take their left leg and place your left leg on the right side of their leg then spin 360' so that you are facing your opponent. During this stage the opponent will get a good pressure on their legs. Do this one safely before you break the leg. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Put their left ankle on their right kneecap so it looks like the digit 4.
steps.content: Put their left ankle on their right kneecap so it looks like the digit 4. [3] X Research source

steps.title: Lie back facing upwards.
steps.content: Lie back facing upwards. [4] X Research source

steps.title: Put your left leg over their left foot.
steps.content: Put your left leg over their left foot. [5] X Research source

steps.title: Apply pressure as hard as you can till your opponent taps out.
steps.content: Apply pressure as hard as you can till your opponent taps out.
